txt.en: 'While we did not capture Ferny, we did stop the threat for the moment. This will please Saeradan, and we should make haste to inform him of this success.\n\n'Return to his cottage, south along the Greenway on the east side of the road, and tell him what you have accomplished.'

'While catching the coward, Ferny, and presenting him to Grimbriar would have established greater acceptance between us, I am pleased to know that the Orcs have been stifled for the moment.\n\n'Still, we cannot be certain that we have stopped their efforts altogether, and I must ask you to continue your efforts for the moment.'
'Return to Saeradan's cabin, south along the Greenway on the east side of the road, and tell him what you have accomplished.'
Rangers, watching movements of enemies from the north and south, are concerned over the appearance of a foe they have long fought in the north.
Talk to Saeradan at his cabin
Saeradan is at his cabin, south of the Old Greenway Fort.\n\nAndreg instructed you to return to Saeradan with news of your success.
